Read in the data
```{r}

#You need to download: https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/GenABEL.data/GenABEL.data_1.0.0.tar.gz
#and https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/GenABEL/GenABEL_1.8-0.tar.gz
#and `install.packages('GanABEL.data_1.0.0.tar.gz', repos=NULL, type = 'source')`
#`install.packages('GanABEL_1.8-0.tar.gz', repos=NULL, type = 'source')` (edited


library(GenABEL)
load("geno_data_raw.rdat")

data_raw[8]
str(data_raw, max.level=4) #takes long time.. from all the data

#Data is S4 format
data_raw@phdata$Breed #just the breeds

data_raw@gtdata@idnames
data_raw@gtdata@coding

str(data_raw@phdata$Breed,list.len = 5)

str(data_raw@gtdata@idnames,list.len = 5)

str(data_raw@gtdata@chromosome)

library(tidyverse)
IDBreed <- tibble(data_raw@phdata$Breed,data_raw@gtdata@idnames) #table of a table :D

phdata <- data_raw@phdata

p <- summary(data_raw@gtdata)#summary of the genetic data
```
